message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Optional' import. Should be before 'org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.function.Function' import. Should be before 'org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem'.
',' should be on the previous line.
',' should be on the previous line.
WhitespaceAround: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
'}' at column 5 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
